name: Wanafly Airsports Ltd.
about: Wanafly Airsports Ltd. is a renowned microlight flying school based at Sywell Aerodrome in Northamptonshire. Run by experienced instructors Dave and Amanda Lord, the school offers comprehensive training in both flex-wing and fixed-wing microlights. With a focus on safety and affordability, Wanafly provides trial flights, gift vouchers, and thorough ground school courses. The school operates from a fantastic aerodrome with three runways, including two grass and one hard-standing, ensuring optimal training conditions. Whether you're a beginner or looking to advance your flying skills, Wanafly Airsports Ltd. is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals in a friendly and supportive environment.
